DOC.brief_summary: Patients plan elective conventional coronary angiography undergo CT coronary angiography ( Dual Source CT ) order assess correlation stenosis detection therapeutic advice conventional CT coronary angiography . We hypothesize good correlation conventional CT coronary angiography stenosis detection therapeutic advice .
DOC.brief_title: Computed Tomographic Angiography Conventional Coronary Angiography Clinical Decision Making
DOC.criteria: Over 50 year age Scheduled elective coronary angiography Patients know iodine allergy Severe renal insufficiency ( creatinine level > 120 micromol/L ) Hyperthyroidism Cardiac arrhythmia Unstable clinical condition Inability follow breathhold command Previous PCI CABG exclude .
